events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to return it because it's the wrong size and I would like a full refund.
The issue has been classified as a Refund request based on the customer's desire to return the product for money back.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Emily for further processing and communication.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the size you received so I can initiate the correct return procedure?
My order number is 783245 and the jacket I received is a size L, but I ordered a size M. I want to return it for a refund.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the return process for your jacket. You will receive a prepaid return label via email soon to send the item back free of charge.
That sounds great, thank you! I look forward to receiving the return label and getting my refund processed quickly.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to confirm if you have sent the jacket back and if you have any questions about the refund process.
Yes, I shipped it yesterday. Thank you for checking in and for your help with this refund.
We have processed your refund and you should see the credit on your payment method within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
This case is now closed. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance. Have a great day!
We sent you a short satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
